/* Epic albums (1979-2005) */ wrong info for Thriller.
/* Motown albums (1972-1975) */ First single came out in November '71; album followed the next February; single came out before album
/* Epic albums (1979-2005) */ We need a source to confirm Thriller sold 30 million copies in the US. For now lets leave it at 28 million.
/* See also */ You are completely correct there was no confirmation for the HIStory sales number. All of the sources say that it sold 18 million copies. Thank you for catching that.
sorry,,Thriller has sold 60 million copies according to BBC. but what web site claims Dangerous sold 30million, HIStory 20 million, BOTDF 7 million, Invincible 11million, and NumberOnes 8.5million?
They are not fansite estimates please see external links for references.
You must use official sales, not fansite estimates
